p: The B. morelensis stems were collected in April 2011 in San Rafael, Coxcatlan, Puebla, while the botanical authentication of the specimen was done by M. C. Maria Edith Lopez Villafranco (curator at the IZTA Herbarium). Specimens were deposited in the herbarium IZTA at the Facultad de Estudios Superiores Iztacala (voucher No. 2412 IZTA).
